verses.roman:
kumbhāṇḍa-kūpakarṇābhyāṁ
balena saha saṁyugaḥ
sāmbasya bāṇa-putreṇa
bāṇena saha sātyakeḥ

synonyms: kumbhāṇḍa-kūpakarṇābhyām—by Kumbhāṇḍa and Kūpakarṇa; balena saha—with Lord Balarāma; saṁyugaḥ—a fight; sāmbasya—of Sāmba; bāṇa-putreṇa—with the son of Bāṇa; bāṇena saha—with Bāṇa; sātyakeḥ—of Sātyaki.
translation: Lord Balarāma fought with Kumbhāṇḍa and Kūpakarṇa, Sāmba with Bāṇa's son, and Sātyaki with Bāṇa.
